text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Group Fitness Talent and Education Sports and Fitness Posted/Updated: 10-24-2015 Brief Job Description: Develop an innovative approach to identifying, acquiring and developing talent from both internal and external channels.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
